# comments
user/repo

# blank lines

# regular repos
https://github.com/user/repo
http://github.com/user/repo.git
https://github.com/user/repo
git@github.com:user/repo

# annotations
bar/baz path:plugins/qux
bar/baz path:themes/qux.zsh-theme

# branch
foobar/foobar branch:baz

# defer
https://github.com/baz/qux kind:defer
https://github.com/qux/baz kind:defer

# non repos
foo
~/.zplugins/bar
$ZDOTDIR/plugins/bar

# dupes
user/repo
https://github.com/user/repo
